news.title: City-Wide Nutri-Slogan and Poster Making Contest to Promote Healthy Living and Nutrition Awareness Among Residents
news.description: The city government invites everyone to participate in the Nutri-slogan and poster making contest, an initiative aimed at raising awareness about the importance of nutrition and healthy living. Participants from various schools and community groups are encouraged to showcase their creativity and commitment to a healthier lifestyle. Winning entries will be displayed in public spaces to inspire the community.

news.title: Public Advisory: Suspension of All Face-to-Face Classes at Every Educational Level Due to Inclement Weather Conditions in Santa Rosa City
news.description: In light of the recent heavy rainfall and potential flooding, the local government has announced the suspension of all face-to-face classes at every educational level in Santa Rosa City. Students, teachers, and parents are advised to stay indoors and monitor official channels for further updates. Online learning may continue as scheduled.

news.title: Annual NutriQuiz Contest Challenges High School Students to Test Their Knowledge on Nutrition and Healthy Habits
news.description: The annual NutriQuiz contest is back, inviting high school students from across the city to compete in a friendly battle of wits focused on nutrition, health, and wellness. The event aims to foster a deeper understanding of healthy habits and encourage lifelong learning about proper nutrition. Prizes await the top performers.

news.title: Crowning Moments and Highlights from the Victors of Rosas ng Santa Rosa 2025 Pageant Night
news.description: Experience the excitement and glamour of the Rosas ng Santa Rosa 2025 pageant as we relive the crowning moments of our new city ambassadors. The event featured dazzling performances, inspiring stories, and a celebration of beauty, intelligence, and community service. Congratulations to all the winners and participants!

news.title: Santa Rosa City Marks Its 21st Cityhood Anniversary with a Vibrant Parade Showcasing Local Culture and Community Spirit
news.description: Santa Rosa City celebrated its 21st Cityhood Anniversary with a grand parade that brought together local schools, organizations, and residents. The event highlighted the city’s rich cultural heritage, achievements, and the unity of its people. Colorful floats, lively performances, and community participation made the celebration truly memorable.

news.title: Comprehensive Guide to the Verification Process for Persons with Disabilities (PWD) ID in Santa Rosa City
news.description: This article provides a detailed, step-by-step guide for persons with disabilities (PWD) on how to verify their PWD IDs in Santa Rosa City. The process ensures that all eligible individuals can access government benefits and services. The guide includes required documents, verification locations, and contact information for assistance.

news.title: Free Anti-Rabies Mass Vaccination Drive for Pets in Santa Rosa City Throughout July 2025
news.description: The City Veterinary Office is conducting a free anti-rabies mass vaccination drive for all pet owners in Santa Rosa City this July. Residents are encouraged to bring their dogs and cats to designated vaccination sites to help prevent the spread of rabies and ensure the safety of the community.

news.title: Santa Rosa City Joins the 111th Anniversary Celebration of Iglesia ni Cristo, Honoring Its Community Contributions
news.description: Santa Rosa City proudly joins the 111th Anniversary celebration of Iglesia ni Cristo, recognizing the organization’s significant contributions to the local community. The event features special programs, outreach activities, and a look back at the church’s history and impact on the city’s development.

news.title: Grand Graduation Ceremony for the Pabasa sa Nutrisyon Program: Celebrating Milestones in Nutrition Education
news.description: Congratulations to all the graduates of the Pabasa sa Nutrisyon program! This milestone event celebrates the achievements of participants who have completed the nutrition education program, empowering families to make healthier food choices and improve their overall well-being.

news.title: Santa Rosa City Celebrates Its 21st Cityhood Anniversary: A Message of Unity and Progress for All Rosenians
news.description: Warmest greetings to all Rosenians as we mark the 21st Cityhood Anniversary of Santa Rosa! This special occasion is a reminder of our shared journey toward progress and prosperity. Let us continue to work together to build a brighter future for our beloved city.

upcomingEvents.title: Nutri-Slogan and Poster Making Contest: Inspiring Creativity and Health Awareness in the Community
upcomingEvents.description: Unleash your artistic talents and join the Nutri-slogan and poster making contest! This event is open to all residents and aims to promote health awareness through creative expression. Winners will receive special prizes and have their works featured in community centers.

upcomingEvents.title: NutriTiktok Drama Dance Competition: A Modern and Fun Way to Celebrate Nutrition Month
upcomingEvents.description: Get ready to dance and act in the NutriTiktok drama dance competition! Participants will create short, nutrition-themed performances to raise awareness about healthy eating. The most creative entries will be showcased on the city’s official social media pages.

upcomingEvents.title: 51st Nutrition Month Culminating Celebration: Family Activities, Games, and Health Education for All
upcomingEvents.description: Join us for the grand culminating activity of the 51st Nutrition Month! Enjoy a day filled with fun games, educational booths, and family-friendly activities designed to promote healthy living. Don’t miss the awarding of contest winners and special guest performances.

announcements.title: City-Wide Cleanup Drive Scheduled This Weekend: Let’s Work Together for a Cleaner and Greener Santa Rosa
announcements.description: The city government is calling on all residents, organizations, and businesses to join the city-wide cleanup drive this Saturday. Let’s unite to keep our streets, parks, and public spaces clean and green. Volunteers will be provided with cleaning materials and refreshments. Your participation makes a difference!

announcements.title: Implementation of a New Traffic Scheme to Alleviate Congestion on Major Roads Starting August 2025
announcements.description: To address increasing traffic congestion, the city will implement a new traffic scheme on major roads beginning next month. Motorists and commuters are advised to familiarize themselves with the new routes and traffic rules. Traffic enforcers will be deployed to assist during the transition period.

announcements.title: Important Reminder: Deadline for Business Permit Renewal is Approaching Fast—Avoid Penalties by Renewing Early
announcements.description: Attention business owners: The deadline for business permit renewal is fast approaching. Please ensure that all requirements are submitted before the due date to avoid penalties and ensure uninterrupted business operations. For assistance, visit the Business Permits and Licensing Office.
